attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that foreign (and EU) drivers when driving in the UK are subject to the same rules as those applied to UK drivers when driving in foreign (and EU) countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the present time foreign drivers breaking the traffic laws are ignored by our policemen because 'it's too difficult' while UK drivers overseas are pursued relentlessly by the police in those countries.  We are supposed to be one state (EU) so why are foreign drivers allowed to get away with it?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
